description: Lief grew up in a land ruled by the evil Shadow Lord - never figuring that someday he`d save the kingdom. Lief was just a kid rebelling against the Grey Guards, until he turned 16 and his father, Jarred, gave him the magical Belt of Deltora. With only his sword and a magic cloak made by his mother, Anna, Lief takes up a quest that leads him to Deltora`s deepest, darkest places.
name: Lief
